import React from 'react'; import ContactForm from '../components/contact/ContactForm'; import { FaPhone, FaEnvelope, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaClock } from 'react-icons/fa'; const ContactPage = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Contact Us

Get in touch with our team for personalized guidance and support.

{/* Contact Information */}

Phone

+1 (234) 567-890

Email

info@gradway.com

Working Hours

Mon-Fri: 9am-6pm

{/* Contact Form */}

Send us a Message

{/* Map and Address */}

Our Location

Office Address

123 Education Street
Academic City, AC 12345
United States

{/* Google Maps iframe */}
); }; export default ContactPage;
